activities: Growth Resources provides information to employees, execcutives and HR Experts about how one behaves and adapts to the environment in a way that is scientifically reliable, valid and meets the guidelines of the Equal Opportunities Employment Commission. The information is brought into a larger framework with other key concepts and indicators, for leadership and organizational development and other applications such as selection and recruitment, team building, interviewing or performance review.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Growth Resources Inc. agrees to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
